topic.title: Projects
topic.p: Projects let you combine multiple %product% reports, where each report contains the result of running %product% on a project.
To create a project, on your team or your personal organization page, click Create project.

chapter.title: Generate a token
chapter.p: After the new project is created, you need to generate a token that will be used by %product% to identify the project to associate the reports with. To do this, click Generate token. For more information about using project tokens, see the section.

Once the token is generated, you can rename the project, regenerate the previously generated token, or delete (archive) the project. To have access to any of these actions, click the upper-right corner of the project.
